cause.description:
This group is to get your friends, family, and whomever to see the words of Jesus Christ. Not telling others of Jesus Christ is greedy, and you want to see your friends after your life on Earth is up.
1. Bringing others to Jesus Christ, to share his glory.
2. Glorify his name.
cause.mission: To spread the word of Jesus Christ and to worship his name.
cause.name: Spread the Word
